rukus.text: And the night when it has grown dark and most still
Your Lord has not forsaken you, nor has He become displeased with you
Assuredly, what comes after will be better for you than what has gone before
And assuredly He will increasingly grant you his favors one after another and you will be contented
Did He not find you an orphan and give shelter (to you)
And find you unguided (by Godâ€™s Messengership), and guide (you)
And find you in want, and make you self-sufficient
Therefore, do not oppress the orphan
Nor chide and drive away the petitioner
And as for the favor of your Lord, proclaim it
